content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your HVAC needs today?
My AC is broken and it's way too hot. I need it fixed immediately but I refuse to pay too much!
I’m sorry to hear about your AC! Can I start by getting your full name, please?
My name is Margaret but don’t bill me any extra fees. I only want the cheapest possible fix.
Thank you, Margaret. Could you provide your address so I can check availability in your area?
I live at 123 Elm Street. I don’t want to spend a lot for this service, so it better be fast and cheap.
Thanks for that, Margaret. Let me quickly confirm if 123 Elm Street is within our service area.
Good news! We can service your address. When would be an ideal time for you to have a technician come by?
I want it done today, and it can’t cost more than $100. That’s final.
I’m checking our schedule for today to see if we have availability.
We do have an opening today in the afternoon. However, I want to be transparent that the cost might exceed $100 depending on the repair needed. Would you like me to book this appointment?
No way! I’m not paying more than $100. I don’t think you even know what you’re doing.
I understand your concerns, Margaret. We always strive to provide quality service at fair prices. If you'd prefer, I can send you a rough price estimate before booking.
Fine, send the estimate, but I doubt it will be under $100. I’m not wasting more time if it's not cheap.
Calculating an estimate now for your HVAC repair...

Estimates require an in-person assessment due to the complexity of HVAC issues. I understand your urgency and price concerns. Would you like me to book a technician to visit your home for an evaluation?
No, I’m done. I don’t want to waste any more time or money. Cancel this and don’t call me again.
Understood, Margaret. I will mark your request as declined and ensure you are not contacted further. Thank you for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. Have a good day.
reason: Customer refused scheduling and requested no further contact
